-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Produces ctags "tags" and etags "TAGS" files for Haskell programs
--   
--   Produces ctags "tags" and etags <a>TAGS</a> files for Haskell
--   programs.
@package hasktags
@version 0.69.1

module Hasktags
data FileData
generate :: [Mode] -> [FileName] -> IO ()
findWithCache :: Bool -> Bool -> FileName -> IO FileData
findThings :: Bool -> FileName -> IO FileData
findThingsInBS :: Bool -> String -> ByteString -> FileData
data Mode
ExtendedCtag :: Mode
IgnoreCloseImpl :: Mode
ETags :: Mode
CTags :: Mode
BothTags :: Mode
Append :: Mode
OutRedir :: String -> Mode
CacheFiles :: Mode
FollowDirectorySymLinks :: Mode
Help :: Mode
HsSuffixes :: [String] -> Mode
AbsolutePath :: Mode

-- | getMode takes a list of modes and extract the mode with the highest
--   precedence. These are as follows: Both, CTags, ETags The default case
--   is Both.
getMode :: [Mode] -> Mode

-- | getOutFile scan the modes searching for output redirection if not
--   found, open the file with name passed as parameter. Handle special
--   file -, which is stdout
getOutFile :: String -> IOMode -> [Mode] -> IO Handle
dirToFiles :: Bool -> [String] -> FilePath -> IO [FilePath]
instance Ord Mode
instance Eq Mode
instance Show Mode
instance Eq Token
instance Show Token
